APS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"81mph","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fi481","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1c62l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ncpd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62l1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2.6","error":false,"guid":"51399900FC2911EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"53E446A0FC2911EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.25","error":false,"guid":"579BF770FC2911EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"59A7F410FC2911EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"4":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"5C8682F0FC2911EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"5":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"5E827A00FC2911EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5djlt","text":"Pour into the mold","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5mt03","text":"Place the comb","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"32qkq","text":"Wait   for gel to solidify","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ftob5","text":"Move to water storage","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"24nl3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71tes","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"60FD8C20FC2911EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5neo6","text":"Place in gel running box and cover with running buffer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dlskk","text":"If running only one gel, make sure the other side has a dummy gel cassette inserted. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aefbi","text":"Fill the space between the two gels with 1X running buffer.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6o3t4","text":"Add   ladder with dye to a well. Add 7.5 - 10 uL samples to wells.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7l8le","text":"Run at 80V until the loading dye reaches the resolving/stacking layer interface.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9p7cf","text":"Run at 180V until the loading dye reaches the end of the gel.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4n0me","text":"Remove gel from casing. Place in petri dish and cover with Coomassie blue dye. Allow to stain overnight.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8lveq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"7.5","error":false,"guid":"F79B7B00FC2A11EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ec4jl","text":"Preparation of Whole Cell Samples for SDS-PAGE analysis","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"52rd7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddth5","text":"Collect whole cell samples before and after induction, and normalize to the cell mass. This allows you to compare the protein expression before and after inducing cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":169}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9iktk","text":"Heat the waterbath or heatblock to  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":35,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9rt5l","text":"Read the optical density at 600 nm (OD600) of the cell culture using a photometer.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7svbm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c396g","text":"Note: the OD600 reading should be within the linear range of the photometer. If the reading appear to be lower than 0.1 or higher than 0.9 concentrate or dilute the cell sample accordingly in order to ensure the OD reading to fall within the 0.1- 0.9 range. If you dilute or concentrate the sample remember to calculate back the initial concentration (e.g. if you diluted 5 times the initial concentration is y*5, where y is the reading you have obtained from the diluted concentration)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":486}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8guvp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"8265F230FC2911EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"95","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9vct1","text":"Calculate the amount of culture to harvest to have a cell pellet equivalent to 1mL of OD600 =1.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3rfgj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6d6j2","text":"            Calculate the amount of biomass using the formula","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":12,"length":49}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"323gd","text":"                        Ci * Vi = Cf * Vf","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":25,"length":2},{"style":"sub","offset":30,"length":1},{"style":"sub","offset":35,"length":2},{"style":"sub","offset":40,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82fiq","text":"            where C stands for \"concentration\", V stands for \"volume\", i stands for \"initial\" and f stands for \"final\". Therefore:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":12,"length":118}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"85jef","text":"                        y OD600 * x mL = 1 OD600* 1 mL ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fv3sk","text":"            where y is the OD600 reading and x is the volume to be calculated. Therefore","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":12,"length":76}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5eud1","text":"                        x mL = ( 1 * 1 )/y","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ph5d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cd2ob","text":"Transfer the amount of culture as calculated into an appropriate tube and centrifuge it at 7,000 rpm for   in tabletop centrifuge","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":105,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eg9h6","text":"Discard the supernatant","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6vml","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"882580F0FC2911EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8n7bc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3agtk","text":"Transfer   of 1X Laemmli Sample Buffer in the tube and resuspend the pellet by pipetting.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"63ou9","text":"Transfer the tube to the water bath/heatblock, inserting it into the floaters and incubate the tube at   for  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":103,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":109,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8kfpg","text":"Transfer the tube on ice for  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eg5ep","text":"Transfer the tube in a bench-top centrifuge and centrifuge at room temperature at max speed (e.g. 13,000 xg) for  ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":113,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6edg0","text":"Transfer the supernatant to a final 1.5 microcentrifuge tube. Note: the pellet won't be visible. Remove the supernatant without touching the bottom of the tube with the pipette tips to avoid carry-over of membranes. This step is necessary to remove membranes and debris that will affect a good quality run of the samples on the SDS-PAGE gel.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":62,"length":279}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9f4k4","text":"Load  of the supernatant on the SDS-PAGE gel.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"57ge7","text":"Store the remaining sample at  .","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":6,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"93j4u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"150","error":false,"guid":"9413DB00FC2911EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9846AF40FC2911EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"95","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"9B0C8600FC2911EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"9D31AFF0FC2911EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"4":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"A2113EF0FC2911EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"5":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"C55A0850FC2A11EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"6":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A6E66DB0FC2911EBAF4F4DB451E26B8E","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}
